title: Velociraptors
alt: You're probably thinking, 'has it been a decade?'  It's been over thirteen years, buddy.
transcript: [Picture of a suburban house, with lines pointing to various aspects.]High bathroom window: probably secure.Outer door: secure.Picture window: VELOCIRAPTOR ENTRY POINT!It's been over a decade since Jurassic Park opened, and I still size up buildings for their potential as shelter against Velociraptor attacks.
